## iter8 report

View report from experiment result

### Synopsis

View report from experiment result

```
iter8 report [flags]
```

### Examples

```

	# view text report
	iter8 report
	
	# view html report
	iter8 report -o html
	
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help                  help for report
  -o, --outputFormat string   text | html (default "text")
```
